pageContext.claim: “These aren't like -- these are people that have criminal records here and in the countries from which they come. Including those charged or convicted, a 48,000 assaults, 12,000 sex crimes and 100 -- listen to this, 1,800 murders. 1,800 murders. OK. Think of it. But if Democrats get elected they will do everything in their power to dismantle ICE.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats have signaled that they would like to change the way ICE operates, but that's not the same as dismantling it entirely.
